com.axelor.studio.service.wkf

Class WkfNodeService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.axelor.studio.service.wkf.WkfNodeService

  •  class WkfNodeService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service handle processing of WkfNode. From wkfNode it generates status field for related model. It will generate field's selection according to nodes and add field in related ViewEditor. Creates permissions for status related with node and assign to roles selected in node. Add status menus(MenuEditor) according to menu details in WkfNode.
    Author:
    axelor

    • Method Detail

      • process

        protected void process()
        Root method to access the service. It start processing of WkfNode and call different methods for that.

      • getStatusField

        private MetaField getStatusField(MetaModel metaModel)
        Method search status field in MetaModel. If status field not found it will create new wkfStatus field.
        Parameters:
        metaModel - Model to search for field.
        Returns:
        MetaField searched or created.

      • removeMetaSelectItems

        Parameters:
        items - List of MetaSelectItem.

        Parameters:
        metaSelect - MetaSelect to update.
        Returns:

      • addMenuEditor

        public MenuEditor addMenuEditor(java.lang.String title,
                       java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String domain,
                       java.lang.String parent,
                       java.lang.Integer order)
        Create/Update MenuEditor from given parameters.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of menu.
        name - Name of menu.
        domain - Domain condition to set in action related to menu.
        parent - Parent menu name.
        order - Menu order.
        Returns:
        MenuEditor created or updated.
